original_text: Say unto them, As truly as I live, saith the Lord, as ye have spoken in mine ears, so will I do to you:
korean_text: 그들에게 이르기를 여호와의 말씀에 내 삶을 두고 맹세하노라 너희 말이 내 귀에 들린 대로 내가 너희에게 행하리니

sentences.original_text: as ye have spoken in mine ears,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내 귀에 말한 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so will I do to you:
